ygData.subject: I know you...
ygData.msgSnippet: * She watched him, his movements and posture. Seeing that he was very uncomfortable and edgy. However, at least he had lowered the gun now. The mode shifted

* She watched him, his movements and posture. Seeing that he was very 
uncomfortable and edgy.
However, at least he had lowered the gun now.

The mode shifted her weight for a moment as Prowl tooka step towards her, 
her posture still mainly stiff and alert.
Her head tilting as she heard him say that word again, or was it a name?
She knew it, but the memory just wasn't coming up.

With caution she slowly stretched her neck out towards the approaching bot, 
sniffing and testing the air.
The scent, she knew. And she knew it belonged to him. Why couldn't she 
remember?!

A small growl trickled out from between her teeth, but one that was not 
threatening, more...content.
She wanted to know just who this man was, and to see if she could come up 
with the reason why he seemed so familier.

The conciouse thoughts of the fembot within were there, but the thoughts of 
both the beast modes were something else.
They were using her thoughts to calm them, but only to suddenly take over 
and strike out. Louring the prey close for the kill.
But none of that showed on the outside, while she stretched her head further 
and tested the scent.*
